# make the add_new function
add_new <- function(sour_data, sour_var, new_var, age, method) {
  add <- sour_data[, c("project_ID", sour_var)]
  add["variable"] <- new_var
  add["measure"] <- add[,sour_var]
  if(is.na(age)) {
    add["age"] <- NA
  } else if(is.numeric(age)) {
    add["age"] <- age
  } else {
    add["age"] <- sour_data[,age]
  }
  if(is.na(method)) {
    add["method"] <- NA
  } else {
    add["method"] <- sour_data[,method]
  }
  add <- add[,c("project_ID", "variable", "measure", "age", "method")]
  names(add) <- c("id", "variable", "measure", "age", "method")
  add <- add[!is.na(add$measure),]
}

    add["method"] <- NA

  }
  add <- add[,c("project_ID", "variable", "measure", "age", "method")]
  names(add) <- c("id", "variable", "measure", "age", "method")
  add <- add[!is.na(add$measure),]
}
